ComicInfo.Title: A Night on Groote Eylandt
ComicInfo.Summary: Nash the Slash arrives at Narcosis Labs and is instantly obliterated by Hiroshima and quickly resurrected by her for unknown reasons. Meanwhile Savage Henry and his band The Bulldaggers are stranded due to vehicle issues when Henry's Caroline Clone is savagely attacked by a giant beast and mortally wounded. Luckily one of the members of The Residents happens by, and takes everyone back to the mystical city of Harmony to rest while they attempt to heal the Caroline Clone.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 22:41:23. [CVDB272483] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 12:37:45. [Issue ID 272294]
ComicInfo.Characters: Caroline Clone,Monsieur Boche,Conrad Schnitzler,Savage Henry,Nash the Slash,Hiroshima
